languages.text: "Ваша Светлость... спасибо, что сообщили об этом. Вы совершенно правы, высокофункциональные сервиторы — это особый дар почитателей Омниссии — из числа тех, которыми был облагодетельствован мой род. Но сегодня... никто из моего рода не был в их сопровождении".

traits.locale_text: "Ваша Светлость... спасибо, что сообщили об этом. Вы совершенно правы, высокофункциональные сервиторы — это особый дар наиболее верным и почитателям Омниссии из числа имеющих влияние семей. Боюсь, я не могу сообщить вам больше, поскольку никто из моей семьи не прибыл сюда в сопровождении таких сервиторов".
traits.speaker: ToriannaGaprak

languages.text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}... Thank you for informing us of this. You are absolutely right: my house has indeed been endowed with high-functioning servitors — a blessing for those who revere the Omnissiah. But today... none of our house members were accompanied by them."
languages.original_text: "Ваша Светлость... спасибо, что сообщили об этом. Вы совершенно правы, высокофункциональные сервиторы — это особый дар почитателей Омниссии — из числа тех, которыми был облагодетельствован мой род. Но сегодня... никто из моего рода не был в их сопровождении".

traits.locale_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}... Thank you for informing us of this. You are absolutely right — my House is indeed endowed with the highly-functional Servitors, gifted for those who revere the Omnissiah. But today... none of our House members were accompanied by them."
traits.speaker: ToriannaGaprak

traits.locale_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}... Thank you for informing us of this. You are absolutely right — my House is indeed endowed with the highly-functional Servitors, gifted for those who revere the Omnissiah. But today... none of our House members were accompanied by them."

traits.locale_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}... Thank you for informing us of this. You are absolutely right: my house has indeed been endowed with high-functioning servitors — a blessing for those who revere the Omnissiah. But today... none of our house members were accompanied by them."
traits.speaker: ToriannaGaprak

traits.locale_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}... Thank you for informing us of this. You are absolutely right: my house has indeed been endowed with high-functioning servitors — a blessing for those who revere the Omnissiah. But today... none of our house members were accompanied by them."

languages.text: 「陛下…お知らせくださり感謝します。仰るとおりです。我が家は確かに高機能サーヴィターを受け取っております。これは万機神を崇める者に贈呈されるものです。しかし、今日は…誰もサーヴィターを連れていませんでした」
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}... Thank you for informing us of this. You are absolutely right: my house has indeed been endowed with high-functioning servitors — a blessing for those who revere the Omnissiah. But today... none of our house members were accompanied by them."

traits.locale_text: 「陛下…お知らせくださり感謝します。仰るとおりです。我が家は確かに高機能サーヴィターを受け取っております。これは万機神を崇める者に贈呈されるものです。しかし、今日は…誰もサーヴィターを連れていませんでした」
traits.speaker: ToriannaGaprak

languages.text: “大人……谢谢您告诉我们这件事。您说得没错，我们家族确实因为忠诚地侍奉欧姆尼塞亚而得到了高智能型机仆的恩赐，不过今天，我们没有携带任何高智能型机仆随行。”
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}... Thank you for informing us of this. You are absolutely right: my house has indeed been endowed with high-functioning servitors — a blessing for those who revere the Omnissiah. But today... none of our house members were accompanied by them."

traits.locale_text: “大人……谢谢您告诉我们这件事。您说得没错，我们家族确实因为忠诚地侍奉欧姆尼塞亚而得到了高智能型奴工的恩赐，不过今天，我们没有携带任何高智能型奴工随行。”
traits.speaker: ToriannaGaprak

languages.text: « Votre Seigneurie... Merci de nous en avoir informés. Vous avez parfaitement raison : ma maison est en effet dotée de servitors ultra-performants, alloués à ceux qui vénèrent l'Omnimessie. Mais aujourd'hui... aucun des membres de ma maison n'en a emmené. »
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}... Thank you for informing us of this. You are absolutely right: my house has indeed been endowed with high-functioning servitors — a blessing for those who revere the Omnissiah. But today... none of our house members were accompanied by them."

traits.locale_text: « Votre Seigneurie... Merci de nous en avoir informés. Vous avez parfaitement raison : ma maison est en effet dotée de servitors ultra-performants, alloués à ceux qui vénèrent l'Omnimessie. Mais aujourd'hui... aucun des membres de ma maison n'en a emmené. »
traits.speaker: ToriannaGaprak

languages.text: «Mil{mf|ord|ady}, gracias por hacérnoslo saber. Tiene razón, mi casa está dotada de los servidores de alto rendimiento, como obsequio para los devotos del Omnissiah. Sin embargo, ninguno de los nuestros iba acompañado de ellos hoy».
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}... Thank you for informing us of this. You are absolutely right: my house has indeed been endowed with high-functioning servitors — a blessing for those who revere the Omnissiah. But today... none of our house members were accompanied by them."

traits.locale_text: «Mil{mf|ord|ady}, gracias por hacérnoslo saber. Tiene razón, mi casa está dotada de los servidores de alto rendimiento, obsequio para los que veneran a Omnissiah. Sin embargo, ninguno de los nuestros iba acompañado de ellos hoy.».
traits.speaker: ToriannaGaprak

languages.text: "Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft} ... Danke, dass Ihr uns in Kenntnis gesetzt habt. Ihr habt vollkommen recht: Mein Haus besitzt in der Tat hochfunktionale Servitoren, ein Segen für die alle Anhänger des Omnissiah. Doch heute ... wurde keines der Mitglieder unseres Hauses von ihnen begleitet."
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}... Thank you for informing us of this. You are absolutely right: my house has indeed been endowed with high-functioning servitors — a blessing for those who revere the Omnissiah. But today... none of our house members were accompanied by them."

traits.locale_text: "Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft} ... Danke, dass Ihr uns in Kenntnis gesetzt habt. Ihr habt vollkommen recht: Mein Haus besitzt in der Tat hochfunktionale Servitoren, ein Geschenk für die treuesten Anhänger des Omnissiah. Doch heute ... wurde keines der Mitglieder unseres Hauses von ihnen begleitet."
traits.speaker: ToriannaGaprak

languages.text: "{mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri... Bize bu bilgiyi verdiğiniz için minnettarız. Kesinlikle haklısınız, Hermesih'i kutsal sayan bizlere bir lütuf olarak hanemize yüksek işlevli hizmetörler hibe edilmiştir. Lakin hizmetörler... Bugün hane mensuplarımızın yanlarında değildi."
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}... Thank you for informing us of this. You are absolutely right: my house has indeed been endowed with high-functioning servitors — a blessing for those who revere the Omnissiah. But today... none of our house members were accompanied by them."

traits.locale_text: "{mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri... Bize bu bilgiyi verdiğiniz için minnettarız. Kesinlikle haklısınız, hanemize yüksek işlevli hizmetörler hibe edilmiştir. Hermesih'i kutsal sayan bizlere bir lütuftur bu. Lakin hizmetörler... bugün hane mensuplarımızın yanlarında değildiler."
traits.speaker: ToriannaGaprak
